thread.title_full: Quiz: Can you guess these footballers from their tattoos? | Daily Mail Online

title: Quiz: Can you guess these footballers from their tattoos? | Daily Mail Online
text: It seems that there are more footballers with tattoos than without these days given the rapid rise of their popularity. Arms, legs, backs, chest, stomach, neck: tattoos now seem to appear almost everywhere on a footballer's body. And while many of these tattoos are distinct, there are now so many footballers sporting similar artwork, that it's harder than you might think to distinguish them from just a picture of their ink. Take the test below to see how many footballers you can identify from a picture of their tattoos We've cropped 20 photographs of players - past and present - with tattoos and your task is to identify them all, each from four options. If you're unable to see the quiz in the MailOnline app or in Facebook Instant Articles please click on the following link to view it on our website instead . RELATED ARTICLES
